REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0048 reute r f BC-DIMIS-<DMISC>-EXTENDS 03-11 0044

TEXT.TITLE: DIMIS <DMISC> EXTENDS WARRANT EXPIRATION
TEXT.BODY: Dimis Inc said it has extended the expiration of its 1,424,500 common stock purchase warrants to September 30 from March 31. Each two warrants allow the purchase of one share at two dlrs. Reuter
